attributes.action: Scrap the National Minimum Wage and let businesses pay what they can afford.
attributes.additional_details:
The National Minimum Wage is something thousands of businesses cannot afford and many have gone/are going out of business for it. It is completely unfair on the employer who has worked hard to give people a job to then tell them that they have to pay their staff a wage they cannot afford to pay.

Scrap the minimum wage and get industry moving again in this country.
